channel.title: Yell, and PM Help, [PI]
channel.description: hey guys, so i get some problems with yell and PM in server. soo here on examples of my problems (a few :p) sender of PM (for some reason it double sends?) http://screensnapr.com/v/VqGgTQ.png receiver of PM http://screensnapr.com/v/jV4Cz2.png also, i am having trouble with my Yelling, the normal player is given the Donor yell, i know, dont laugh, ugly ass yell icon :p http://screensnapr.com/v/AtkdRl.png well anything u can do to help would be great xD

item.title: Yell, and PM Help, [PI]
item.dc:creator: @mock_pro mock pro
item.description:

hey guys, so i get some problems with yell and PM in server. soo here on examples of my problems (a few :p)
